Class Summary
HTMLUtil Class with HTML related utility functions, in particular HTML generation.
XMLNodeIterator Simple adapter class to iterate over a DOM tree nodes children.
XMLNodeListIterator Simple adapter class to iterate over a DOM tree nodes children.
